creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: colorful images of monks and laypeople in and around shrines, and boats; dragon at end; interspersed with blocks of text; woodblock printed and hand tinted
medium: Ink printed on paper with hand-applied color
title: Illustrations of the Life and Deeds of the Grand Master of Mount Kōya, vol. 2
